Hello world!

I saw on Steam that the Midweek deal is Space Engineer at 33% off. Since its gameplay is similar to KSP, I wonder : should I buy it? Or shouldn't I?
its up to you really, i'm going to wait untill its further developed to get it.
Gameplay similar to KSP? I thought it had more wing commander style flight dynamics.
Buy it now, it's great and only going to be t more expensive as they develope it further.

The gameplay is nothing like ksp, its waaaay more like minecraft in space with physics(which is fine, i own it). but its nothing like ksp, its more classic sci fi ships nothing simulated like orbits and its focus is on dogfighting and such.
